message: I love that the range of ethnicity in Disney characters/princesses is broadening! I think it's great! But have some of you forgotten about Mulan, Pocahontas, Tiana, Esmeralda and Jasmine? It's also important to remember that you can't just group all light skinned people together and label them as """"white"""". I think a big step for Disney would be creating a princess that has different body type. Kids need to know that everybody looks different and that all body types are beautiful! Wether you're curvy or stick thin with no curves, tall, short, athletic, etc.

message:
Dear Rep Brooks - sorry there are so many small-minded people in this world, but of course, this is nothing new. Even though I'm a republican and will likely have to vote for Trump (unfortunately), I believe you are very correct in your statements about Trump. Your balanced and fair
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
with """"Washington"""". Fix that, and we'll never have to deal with, or have our party, represented by someone like Trump ever again. Don't fix it, and the GOP (at least as we know it today, or better, knew it back when) may cease to exist. Good luck. Hang in there.

message:
Given the fact that the trio were caught trying to drive through the Holland Tunnel with a small arsenal, that bail hardly seems unreasonable. And what exactly were they planning on doing once they got to their destination with all of those guns? This whole convoluted story about the girl
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
keeps changing. The lawyer should really be thanking the Port Authority for saving his clients from themselves. Because if they had actually used those guns, then their lives would pretty much be over regardless of how the shootout went. They'd either be dead, or looking at very long prison sentences.
